import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movie', templateUrl: './movie.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movie.component.scss'] }) export class MovieComponent { }

Flash

Release Date: 06/16/2023

After helping Bruce Wayne and Diana Prince stop a hospital robbery gone wrong in Gotham Cityand captured Falcone's son, Barry Allen revisits his childhood home and remembers his youth with his parents Nora and Henry, before Henry's wrongful imprisonment for Nora's murder.

Get Tickets
